About

A post with a gallery of images

Oct 1, 2016

Galleries can be easily generated in two steps:

  • define a gallery in the front-matter of your post in the galleries object. The gallery must have the properties name and files. Each file is the path (relative to the current article) to an image.
---
galleries:
- name: my-gallery-name
  file:
    - relative/path/to/image.jpg
    - other_image.png
---
  • include the gallery in your post using the template gallery.html. Make sure to the gallery= parameter and use the name that was defined in front-matter.
 \\like this: { % include gallery.html gallery="my-gallery-name" % }

Here is the result, Each thumbnail links to the full image:
